transArray.content: The front desk service is very good, the breakfast is quite rich, and you can park for free. There is a washing machine and dryer on the first floor. Recommended

Dear guest, thank you for staying at Beijing Chaoyang Park Qiaodong Branch and giving us a favorable review. The hotel belongs to the Hanting 2.7 version. The products are very new, clean and hygienic, and very convenient. The breakfast is a central buffet with rich and delicious styles. There is also free parking and Laundry room, I hope this hotel can become your first choice in Beijing, and we sincerely look forward to your visit again!
